title: CN Level 2 â€” OSI & TCP/IP Models
intro: This level focuses on layered models used to understand networking.
points: Know the 7 layers of OSI model (names only).
Know the 4/5 layers of TCP/IP model.
Understand why layering is used (abstraction, modularity).
Be able to roughly map protocols to layers (HTTP, TCP, IP, etc.).
Remember that real Internet follows TCP/IP more closely than OSI.
